block.p: Amelida Ortiz and Peter Allen Weinmann are to be married today by Rabbi Lisa Eiduson at Temple Beth Zion in Buffalo.

The bride, 30, is in the Buffalo office of the Census Bureau, working with community organizations to increase census form completion. She graduated from the State University at Buffalo. She is a daughter of Judith Lopez of Buffalo and Herminio Ortiz of Lockport, N.Y. Her father is a mental health counselor at Niagara Falls, N.Y., Memorial Medical Center. Her mother coordinates the afterschool program at the Herman Badillo Bilingual Academy in Buffalo.

She is a daughter of Judith Lopez of Buffalo and Herminio Ortiz of Lockport, N.Y. Her father is a mental health counselor at Niagara Falls, N.Y., Memorial Medical Center. Mr. Weinmann, 38, is a lawyer in Buffalo and the vice chairman of the Buffalo Commission on Citizen's Rights and Community Relations. He graduated from Case Western Reserve. He received a law degree from Yeshiva and a master's degree in public administration from Harvard. He is the son of Margit Weinmann of Amherst, N.Y., and the late Dr. Paul L. Weinmann. His father was a dermatologist in Buffalo and the chief of dermatology at Sisters of Charity Hospital there. The bridegroom's mother managed her husband's private practice.
